<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Kas Xi Rai](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1481)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />

<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 23</row>

**Perception** +26

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +31, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +29, [Crime Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +27, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +30, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +30, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +31, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +31

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +6

**Con** +0

**Int** +2

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
[_bracers of armor II_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=416), _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greater corrosive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_, [_potion of undetectability_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=195)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 38 (42 vs. reactions and ranged weapon attacks)

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +32 

**Will** +29 

</row>

**HP** 300

**Tangled Forest Trip** <actions string="Free Action" /> **Requirements** Kas Xi Rai is in tangled forest stance; **Trigger** A creature leaves a space within Kas Xi Rai's reach; **Effect** The triggering creature must attempt a DC 37 Reflex save, [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check, or [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check. On a failure, the creature is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) for that action.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet, climb 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +31 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 3d6+12 bludgeoning plus 1d6 acid

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lashing branch +31 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 3d8+12 slashing plus 1d6 acid

**Monk Ki Spells** DC 38, 3 Focus Points
- **8th**
[Ki Rush](/Spells.aspx?ID=485), [Ki Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=486), [Wind Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=490)

**Exhausting Flurry**   When Kas Xi Rai targets the same creature with two Strikes from her Flurry of Blows and at least one hits and deals damage, the target must succeed at a DC 39 Fortitude save or be [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) and take a –5-foot status penalty to land Speed while enfeebled. On a critical failure, the creature is enfeebled 2 and takes a –10-foot status penalty to land Speed while enfeebled.

**Flurry of Blows** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) Kas Xi Rai makes two Strikes with her fist. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

**Tangled Forest Rake** <actions string="Single Action" />  Kas Xi Rai makes a lashing branch Strike. If she hits and deals damage, she forces the target to move 5 feet into a space within her reach.

**Tangled Forest Stance** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Stance](/Traits.aspx?ID=152)) Kas Xi Rai extends her arms and enters a deadly tree-like combat stance. As long as she is in this stance, Kas Xi Rai can use Tangled Forest Trip and Tangled Forest Rake and make lashing branch Strikes with her fists.

</column>
name: Kas Xi Rai
